title: MBMBaM 312: Face 2 Face: Live from Drowzee City
description: Here's our live show from the Wilbur Theater in beautiful Boston, MA! We talk a lot about Pokemon Go in this episode, which is only appropriate, because one out of the three of us was also playing Pokemon Go basically the whole time we were on stage.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
